## Air Quality

@fig-airquality further explores the impact of temperature on ozone level. We can see that ozone levels rise with increasing temperatures. 

```{r}
#| label: fig-airquality
#| fig-cap: "Temperature and ozone level."
#| warning: false

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```
